page.title: 05Education-The High School
page.content: Llandovery{County High School}whose Welsh name is{Ysgol Pantycelyn}has about{480 children.}The school serves an area of approximately{ten miles {radius. There are{28 on the teaching staff. {Lessons}are{taught}mainly in{English but most subjects are taught through the medium of{Welsh}stream.{Subjects taught are English, Welsh, French, History, Geography, Mathematics, Biology, Rural Science, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Studies, Art, Home Ecomomics, Needlework, Metalwork, Woodwork,Scripture, Religious Education, Physical Education and Games.
